name: Rules of Nature
description:
This is a Stealth / Destruction game / tech demo. The goal is to reach the crown at the top, by evading guards and using the swords you find along the way to smash a path through to the end. Broken walls may obstruct your enemies, but be careful not to smash a staircase you need to progress :D

In the middle of some major bugfixes, sorry.
Known Issues:
Some stairways break weirdly.
Some guards jitter.
Lag spike every five seconds [this is due to unoptimized pathfinding code.]
The game is ugly as sin. That's the next planned update.
The 'stealth' mechanic is lacking - I will be adding proper hiding places.

Space: Jump

WASD: move

Q: Force Push debris [destroys smaller pieces.]

Left Click: Swing Weapon
